definitions.text: be fully aware or cognizant of

examples: I just can't see your point
Does she realize how important this decision is?

definitions.text: make real or concrete; give reality or substance to
examples: our ideas must be substantiated into actions

definitions.text: earn on some commercial or business transaction; earn as salary or wages
examples: How much do you make a month in your new job?
She earns a lot in her new job
this merger brought in lots of money

definitions.text: convert into cash; of goods and property
expand or complete (a part in a piece of baroque music) by supplying the harmonies indicated in the figured bass
